column5: very nice    my turn this weekend ..... Come on Friday

I headed up to Nipissing this weekend with the company of my girlfriend Kelli and my dad.  We spent Friday to Sunday in a bungalow with Grump and Grumpy's.  We've been going there for three years, these guys are great, and the fishing is usually just as good.  minnows worked well as always, but I dropped to light line (3 lbs) and 1/16 oz jigs to test out my new ultralight ice rod and new vexilar unit, good choice, because big whities are fun on 3lbs test.  We ended up with 7 whities, 3 returned.  Lots of perch and herring, 2 pike and 1 walleye, plus a smelt.  Good variety to say the least.  Great Weekend overall   First whitie of the night, 8:48 pm   Kelli with a little pike on 4 lbs line and my crappie rod, lots of fun   Going light, perch fishin   Goin light for whities   double whites   Kelli with her evening whitie   During an intense game of crazy eight countdown, the tipup .... went up   Final haul for starving college students
Thanks for the report Steve! Should keep you off the Kraft Diner for a week or two !
LOL ... cant wait!!!
great report thanks!

Great weekend of fishing with your family steve !!!!.  ...you guys all did very well,and like wayne said,it should be fish on the menu for at least a week !!!    nice pics off all those whities...man they are so tasty cheers to everyone    soooo..what time is dinner ??? lol..lol
WOW, great haul.  Great report and pics.  Thanks.  Joey
Great report and pics!!!  Those are some excellent fish!!!
Who said KD, damn, gotta go eat now, lol.  nice catching btw.
Nice fish.
Nice Whities. What happened did the old man get skunked or just camera shy ?
congrats on a good weekend
lol. camera shy, he was the perch/herring slayer
Thats the way to spend the weekend great looking fish  rob
Nice fish, looks like an enjoyable way to spend your weekend
Nice fish guy. you working at the classic?
looks like you had an awesome time! BIG WHITIES i must say! great job!

Dude!?!? where was the invite?!?!  joking! good job on the whities! those are nice lookin fish!  look's like i'm probably going to scugog on monday (tomorrow... technically today) for crappies and walleye, i know you said you've got class till 5 on mondays, but, after this coming weekend, i'll be free, you wanna hit the bog the week after maybe? send me a message on facebook!
.....Mmmmmmm whities, I like whities!   Good job on a nice mixed bag of fish.
great report!  Got to love nipissing!  Cheers!
Nice job.  Great report.  Heading to Nippising this weekend myself.

Nice report Steve! Question for ya though... Over the years I've caught a whack of whitefish in Nippissing, it really is a great and underutilized fishery.. Anyhow, the few I have kept to eat have always been infested with worms, really grossed me out. How were the ones you guys kept? Just curious..  Cheers,  Mike
Great report and nice haul. Peace Ken
~~~~  Fantastic report bud, best report I've read from Nip
Great report and pics....man those are big Whities!!
Fantastic report!  It's just like my ice fishing outings....except I dont stay in awesome huts like that and I dont catch anything....LOL  Great pics and the fishing looked great!
